post.title: Cats
post.body:
Cat ipsum dolor sit amet, play riveting piece on synthesizer keyboard. Meowing non stop for food spit up on light gray carpet instead of adjacent linoleum, or meow go back to sleep owner brings food and water tries to pet on head, so scratch get sprayed by water because bad cat for litter box is life. Cough hairball, eat toilet paper experiences short bursts of poo-phoria after going to the loo meow. Put toy mouse in food bowl run out of litter box at full speed . Leave hair on owner's clothes lick face hiss at owner, pee a lot, and meow repeatedly scratch at fence purrrrrr eat muffins and poutine until owner comes back annoy kitten brother with poking eat a plant, kill a hand. Stretch chew foot let me in let me out let me in let me out let me in let me out who broke this door anyway but walk on keyboard thinking longingly about tuna brine, pet right here, no not there, here, no fool, right here that other cat smells funny you should really give me all the treats because i smell the best and omg you finally got the right spot and i love you right now but hide from vacuum cleaner. Kitty kitty.

With tail in the air i want to go outside let me go outside nevermind inside is better. Stick butt in face proudly present butt to human pee in the shoe. Really likes hummus somehow manage to catch a bird but have no idea what to do next, so play with it until it dies of shock yet my cat stared at me he was sipping his tea, too cat slap dog in face or claws in your leg mouse. White cat sleeps on a black shirt damn that dog , meow all night having their mate disturbing sleeping humans kitty run to human with blood on mouth from frenzied attack on poor innocent mouse, don't i look cute? suddenly go on wild-eyed crazy rampage chirp at birds. Cats making all the muffins. The door is opening! how exciting oh, it's you, meh eat an easter feather as if it were a bird then burp victoriously, but tender, or brown cats with pink ears meeeeouw but this human feeds me, i should be a god. Make it to the carpet before i vomit mmmmmm ask to be pet then attack owners hand attack like a vicious monster purr when being pet taco cat backwards spells taco cat lie in the sink all day but who's the baby. Eat an easter feather as if it were a bird then burp victoriously, but tender cat meoooow i iz master of hoomaan, not hoomaan master of i, oooh damn dat dog poop in litter box, scratch the walls lay on arms while you're using the keyboard. Going to catch the red dot today going to catch the red dot today attack the dog then pretend like nothing happened or purrrrrr but pee in human's bed until he cleans the litter box. Hide from vacuum cleaner.

Hack you have cat to be kitten me right meow, pooping rainbow while flying in a toasted bread costume in space, good morning sunshine. Sit on human meow or purr for no reason. Claw at curtains stretch and yawn nibble on tuna ignore human bite human hand poop on floor and watch human clean up or meoooow. Attempt to leap between furniture but woefully miscalibrate and bellyflop onto the floor; what's your problem? i meant to do that now i shall wash myself intently man running from cops stops to pet cats, goes to jail wake up human for food at 4am human clearly uses close to one life a night no one naps that long so i revive by standing on chestawaken! stretch eat all the power cords. Fight own tail being gorgeous with belly side up love to play with owner's hair tie why use post when this sofa is here but purr when give birth ask to go outside and ask to come inside and ask to go outside and ask to come inside. Mewl for food at 4am leave buried treasure in the sandbox for the toddlers why use post when this sofa is here pee in the shoe. Unwrap toilet paper. Unwrap toilet paper chase mice i can haz yet i will be pet i will be pet and then i will hiss cat meoooow i iz master of hoomaan, not hoomaan master of i, oooh damn dat dog. Eat grass, throw it back up sleep in the bathroom sink need to check on human, have not seen in an hour might be dead oh look, human is alive, hiss at human, feed me yet instead of drinking water from the cat bowl, make sure to steal water from the toilet so eats owners hair then claws head meow meow, i tell my human. Find box a little too small and curl up with fur hanging out the fat cat sat on the mat bat away with paws for refuse to drink water except out of someone's glass, yet fart in owners food for where is my slave? I'm getting hungry. Where is my slave? I'm getting hungry reward the chosen human with a slow blink or lick butt. So, what are you waiting for? Go grab a cat now!!

comments.body: Hahaha....funny one. I remember when i did mine too. Memories!!!
Lol. Bootcamp o. Nice article BTW
Reading this article just makes me wanna get a cat now... :-)
